scripts.start: REACT_APP_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') REACT_APP_GCLOUD_PROJECT=$(firebase use) react-scripts start
scripts.build: REACT_APP_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') REACT_APP_GCLOUD_PROJECT=$(firebase use) react-scripts build
scripts.build:widget: REACT_APP_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') REACT_APP_GCLOUD_PROJECT=$(firebase use) parcel build src/index.tsx --no-source-maps --experimental-scope-hoisting -d build
scripts.build:bundle: REACT_APP_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') REACT_APP_GCLOUD_PROJECT=$(firebase use) react-scripts build && cat ./build/static/js/*.js > ./dist/apply-widget.min.js
scripts.test: REACT_APP_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') REACT_APP_GCLOUD_PROJECT=$(firebase use) react-scripts test
scripts.deploy:prod: firebase use streetcampaign-prod && REACT_APP_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') yarn build && firebase deploy --except functions && firebase use streetcampaign-master
scripts.release: git checkout prod && git rebase origin/master && git push && git checkout master
